patterns.description: Mentions a common rental listing platform — contextual signal, not conclusive alone.
Too-good-to-be-true rent with all utilities included.

patterns.pattern: i am currently (overseas|out of the country|working abroad)
patterns.description: Landlord claims to be overseas and can't show the unit — classic rental scam setup.

patterns.pattern: cannot show you the place before you (send|pay) (the )?(deposit|first and last)
patterns.description: Demands deposit before any viewing — never pay without seeing the property in person.

patterns.pattern: please send (first and last|a deposit of \$?[0-9,.]+) via (e-Transfer|interac|wire)
patterns.description: Requests upfront e-Transfer or wire deposit for a rental — high-risk payment method.

patterns.pattern: do not worry, i will mail you the keys|the keys will be with the cleaner
patterns.description: Promises to mail keys or leave with a third party after deposit — you'll never get them.
